comment: A token that tracks the progress of an IME request.

variables.name: sEmptyBinder
variables.comment: Empty binder, lazily initialized, used for empty token instantiation.

variables.name: mBinder
variables.comment: The binder used to identify this token.

methods.name: public IBinder getBinder()
methods.comment: Returns the binder used to identify this token.

methods.name: public String getTag()
methods.comment: Returns the logging tag of this token.

methods.name: private static String createTag(@NonNull String component)
methods.comment:
* Creates a logging tag.
         *
         * @param component the name of the component that created the IME request.

methods.name: public static Token empty()
methods.comment: Returns a new token with an empty binder.

methods.name: static Token empty(@NonNull String tag)
methods.comment: Returns a new token with an empty binder and the given logging tag.

methods.name: private static IBinder getEmptyBinder()
methods.comment: Returns the empty binder instance for empty token creation, lazily initializing it.

methods.name: public int describeContents()
methods.comment: For Parcelable, no special marshalled objects.
